title: RP ripped during the gemstone time limited event.. really riot?
body:
I have purchased $100 RP yesterday afternoon, but I never received it (Money went out of my credit card).
I submitted a ticket with a screenshot proof of money debited and although I do believe that Riot will adjust this in the future, I NEED MY GEMSTONES AND AUGMENT CACHES.
What do I do with this TIME-LIMITED EVENT now..

replies.body: There were some issues yesterday afternoon where some purchase issues failed to process.  We'd like to help with your specific issue, but through a ticket as this is dealing with sensitive account information.  Looking into this for you, I see that your ticket has been successfully submitted.  Our billing team will respond to it as soon as possible.  Rest easy, there's still quite a bit of time for this project event!
